this is sed command
 
 cat file1.txt
s01 em1 10000 25
s02 em2 12000 24
s03 em3 11020 22
s04 em4 13000 23
s05 em5 19000 26
s06 em6 20000 25
s07 em7 25000 27
s08 em8 32000 28
 
 sed 's/s01/01/' file1.txt
01 em1 10000 25
s02 em2 12000 24
s03 em3 11020 22
s04 em4 13000 23
s05 em5 19000 26
s06 em6 20000 25
s07 em7 25000 27
s08 em8 32000 28
 
 
s01 em1 10000 25
s02 em2 12000 24
s03 em3 11020 22
s04 em4 13000 23
s05 em5 19000 26
s06 em6 20000 25
s07 em7 25000 27
s08 em8 32000 28
 
sed 's/25/21/g' file1.txt 
s01 em1 10000 21
s02 em2 12000 24
s03 em3 11020 22
s04 em4 13000 23
s05 em5 19000 26
s06 em6 20000 21
s07 em7 21000 27
s08 em8 32000 28
 
 cat file1.txt
s01 em1 10000 25
s02 em2 12000 24
s03 em3 11020 22
s04 em4 13000 23
s05 em5 19000 26
s06 em6 20000 25
s07 em7 25000 27
s08 em8 32000 28
 
sed '2d' file1.txt 
s01 em1 10000 25
s03 em3 11020 22
s04 em4 13000 23
s05 em5 19000 26
s06 em6 20000 25
s07 em7 25000 27
s08 em8 32000 28
 
sed '' file1.txt 
s01 em1 10000 25
s02 em2 12000 24
s03 em3 11020 22
s04 em4 13000 23
s05 em5 19000 26
s06 em6 20000 25
s07 em7 25000 27
 
 sed '1,4d' file1.txt
s05 em5 19000 26
s06 em6 20000 25
s07 em7 25000 27
s08 em8 32000 28
 
sed '4,' file1.txt 
s01 em1 10000 25
s02 em2 12000 24
s03 em3 11020 22
 
 cat file1.txt
s01 em1 10000 25
s02 em2 12000 24
s03 em3 11020 22
s04 em4 13000 23
s05 em5 19000 26
s06 em6 20000 25
s07 em7 25000 27
s08 em8 32000 28
 
 sed '/22/d' file1.txt
s01 em1 10000 25
s02 em2 12000 24
s04 em4 13000 23
s05 em5 19000 26
s06 em6 20000 25
s07 em7 25000 27
s08 em8 32000 28
